elements.name: hex-input
elements.description: A custom element for entering color in HEX format.

properties.name: alpha
properties.description: When true, `#rgba` and `#rrggbbaa` color formats are allowed.

properties.name: prefixed
properties.description: When true, `#` prefix is displayed in the input.

events.name: color-changed
events.description: Event fired when color is changed.
